Title: crapsdb example
Description:
Shell example

This is an example of using the shell we have implemented on CRAPS.
It does not seem interesting but it actually is:
- we wrote the compiler it is run on;
- we wrote the kernel it runs;
- we wrote the compiler to compiler the kernel for the processor;
- we wrote the shell and other tasks;
